message: The room looks like a nursery.
Gifts wrapped in colorful paper, toys, ribbons, balloons. The colors are making me dizzy.
In the center of the room, a man sits draped limply over a chair. I could almost mistake him for a doll.
A lump rises in my throat. He looks so lifeless.
I reach out and touch his cheek. His skin is so pale it's almost translucent... and cold.
I recall how he looked in that dark, dismal alley.
How he huddled in the shadows like a lost child.
Toue said that Sei split off pieces of himself, that doing so weakened him, little by little.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm sorry it took me so long."
At the sound of my murmur, Sei's eyelids flutter.
Slowly... his eyes turn to look at me.
Once again, an electric jolt rips through my body.
